messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

error expense report error expense report hi unfortunately want submit error cannot submit expense report because contains errors must mention checked policy acceptance please thanks friday pm re report hi tried submit expense report error cannot submit expense report because contains errors expense report looks bellow input type errors please thanks wednesday pm re report hello two days thanks great accounts payable tuesday pm re report hi haven done yet please per diem values thanks wrote hello did manage create expense report mentioned trip thank great accounts payable

message.reasoning:
**Assessing Ticket Classification**

I'm currently focused on the best category for this expense report issue.  The text details errors in an expense report and mentions policy, per diem, and account concerns. I'm leaning toward either "HR Support" or "Administrative rights" but will make sure this is the most accurate.


**Determining Ticket Category**

I've honed in on the HR Support category for this expense report ticket. The user can't submit due to errors, policy checks are needed, and per diem plus accounting are mentioned.  While "Administrative rights" was considered, "HR Support" feels more directly relevant to the issue of expense report submission itself. I'm now certain this categorization is correct.
